title: Click Here For Murder
description: It’s hard to do legwork with no legs. So when her coworker Ray Santiago is found murdered in an alley, Artificial Intelligence Personality Turing needs her human friends’ help to find his killer. But just as they start to put together the puzzle of Ray’s fabricated life, outside dangers creep into the lab—and, perhaps, within the very computer in which Turing lives.
author: Donna Andrews
